Package index

Description

africalaws-package africalaws
Interface to the Laws.Africa API

Authentication

set_api_token()
Set a Laws.Africa API token

Get

al_get_areas() al_get_works()
Retrieve various available information from Laws.Africa

Utilities

al_structure_areas() al_structure_work() al_structure_works()
Structure list outputs
